author: .paulharris
content: apparently there may be people digging into the mechanics of blob fees as a general thing, not just the concept of changing target / max? wondering where i get across that discussion if its happening?

author: roberto.bayardo
content: <@656728086410297356> and <@199561711278227457> are involved in some of those discussions.  Though as far as I'm aware the only other change being considered beyond target/max changes is a higher min blob fee, at least for PectrA.

author: potuz
content: There are discussions around this for example <https://hackmd.io/@Nerolation/Sket-vEzyl> but I suspect that may be closed groups or just people working on their own to bring this to the next ACD.
